entry.title: Paint Brushes Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Medium
Price: 6.00 - 13.50 (7 variants)

This cup with paint brushes is another of my very favorite charms. The cup has flowers engraved on the side, maybe it was a hand thrown piece of ceramics. Each brush is unique and does an entirely different task. For those of you that paint, your understanding is complete. It's just the perfect charm for all artists.
